reviewText: I ACTUALLY BOUGHT THIS BEFORE REVENGE OF THE NINJA CAME OUT ON BLU RAY BUT IM STILL HAPPY WITH IT YPU GET 3 MOVIES THAT ARE REALLY GOOD MOVIES AND NOT A BAD PRICE IF YOU ENJOYED ENTER THE NINJA AND JUST ALL THE SHO KOSUGI MOVIES YEARS AGO YOU WILL ENOY THIS
If Michael Dudikoff stares in the movie I know its gonna be awesome!
Good Triple Package for the price

I remember buying this particular release some time ago at BestBuy. I was very happy with this purchase. I didn't care if they were widescreen or not. I thought the  quality of the transfers was very good. And the movies were pretty good too.

Extremely disappointed with this purchase,  only American Ninja is in widescreen, the other 2 are full screen. I would repurchase the other 3 pack but I'll just wait for the upcoming bluray releases of American Ninja and Revenge of the Ninja.
